About.hi: Hi! I'm Ash, a creative and results-driven full-stack developer.
About.techs: I've worked with a variety of technologies in web development,including languages such as JavaScript, Typescript and SQL.
About.ux: For user experience, I've been developing with React,Next JS, Redux, Hooks, React-Router, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, CSS and more. On the Back-End, I've been working with Node.js and Express, and in terms of databases, I've been storing and organizing data with Sequelize, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Firebase, among others. Also, I have experience with tools like GitHub, Postman, Trello, Jira, Slack, Visual Studio, Vercel, Canva and Figma. At the moment, I am learning React Native and strengthening my frontend development skills.
About.background: My background as an English teacher helped me to develop useful soft skills, such as leadership, teamwork and proactive problem-solving. Also, I'm well-organized in managing projects and timelines. Above all, I'm passionate about technology, thrive in collaborative environments and open to new challenges.

Main.homeSubtitle: I invite you to know more about me and what I do

Projects.projectsSubtitle: Check out some of my work here

cheers.title: Cheers - SaaS Solution
cheers.description: Full-stack development of a SaaS platform for beverage orders. Integrated Stripe payments, real-time database with Firebase, and QR code generation. Implemented multilingual support and admin dashboard.

nearbytour.title: NearByTour - Travel Platform
nearbytour.description: Led frontend development using Next.js and TypeScript. Created interactive maps and experience cards with Tailwind CSS. Implemented geolocation features and optimized image loading.

aracellipmu.title: Aracelli PMU - E-commerce
aracellipmu.description: Freelance Next.js e-commerce solution. Developed high-conversion UI/UX flow with external platform integration. Boosted client sales by 40% through SEO optimizations and performance tuning.

thinderpet.title: ThinderPet - Pet Matching
thinderpet.description: Created pet profile system with advanced search filters. Implemented swipe functionality and pet profile management.

tunematch.title: TuneMatch - Music Social
tunematch.description: Built real-time chat and concert tracking features. Integrated Last.fm API for music recommendations. Developed responsive UI with React and Tailwind CSS.

videogames.title: Video Games API - Gaming Platform
videogames.description: Developed a RESTful API for video game data management. Implemented CRUD operations, and search filters. Built with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.

starwars.title: Star Wars Wiki - Fan Platform
starwars.description: Created a fan platform for Star Wars enthusiasts. Integrated SWAPI (Star Wars API) to fetch character and movie data. Designed responsive UI with React and CSS modules.
